name: Specter Deflector
description:
A side-scrolling shooter made in 4 weeks for Programming I (~Spring 2018). Graphical assets were provided by my teacher. The Infinity mode was all that was needed, but made the Adventure mode for fun (which was incomplete).

Known Bugs: Sound doesn't work on play. Solution: mess with the volume slider.

Marble Machine remix by Triadic for the in-game music

Undertale OST - Undyne's End for the gameover screen

Homestuck - Showtime Remix by The Gentlejan for the "boss encounter" music
